module.name: cvzCore
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: Instantiate a convergence point for several yarp modalities. Provides bi-directional associative learning and predictions.

param.desc: Point to the config file containing the definition of modalities.
Specify the name of the cvz. It will act as a prefix for all ports
The algorithm to be used (mmcm, mlp, or icvz for an abstract dummy class)
The map width in neurons. (parameter specific to mmcm)
The map height in neurons. (parameter specific to mmcm)
The number of layers. (parameter specific to mmcm)

input.description: Accept a vector input of 6 components within the limits of the head joints (as defined in icub_head.ini)

output.description: Outputs a vector of 6 components within the limits of the head joints (as defined in icub_head.ini). Correspond to the actual prediction of the cvz.

input.description: Accept a vector input of 9 components within the limits of the inertia sensor (as defined in icub_head.ini)

output.description: Outputs a vector of 9 components within the limits of the inertia sensor (as defined in icub_head.ini). Correspond to the actual prediction of the cvz.
